name: Robbery Bob: Man of Steal
description: Sneak through over 100 levels in this fun-filled take on the stealth puzzle genre!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor or equivalent. Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL-compatible graphics card (512MB) Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Supports Xinput and DirectInput compatible controllers.

reviews.review_text: Sweet! Excellent and fun stealth game for random gamers :|
